price: Dubartoonni hiikaman haala beekamaan qananiifamuu qaban. (Kun) warra Rabbiin sodaatan irratti haqa.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
